context: Will this work with a wii mini to 1080p HD TV?
response: The Wii Mini only supports the regular composite cables (red, white, and yellow) unfortunately.
No force feedback. No Z axis for rudder control either.

context: Will this play on Australian 3ds consoles?
response: No, it won't, because you have to purchase a game that has your matching region.

context: Is this the actual sims 3 or just an expansion ?
response: This is the sims 3 game and it comes with 2 expansions!

context: Will this game work on an American PS3?
response: Yes! PerfectlyThe only thing that may require extra attention is any Downloadable content or network playablility.Since it is a U.K. version, the buyer may have to create a second PSN Network profile under the U.K. network to access any of those extras.

context: can the left and right side buttons be used to go back and forward on online websites?
response: I'm sure there is a way, in the software that comes with the mouse you can macro any button to do anything. I haven't really messed with it yet though

context: If I buy this now, how will the points work since Microsoft changed the point system into currency instead?
response: The points are converted to the equivalent amount of Xbox Cash. No problem at all, it does it automatically.

context: What is the difference between Saitek Pro Flight Rudder Pedals and Saitek Pro Cessna Rudder Pedals?
response: The Cessna Rudder Pedals are basically the same but are more realistic to that of an actual Cessna Aircraft

context: Should I pay a little extra for G430 surround sound? Is actually worth the extra few bucks in terms of the technology difference?
response: i personally think this guy's sound really good!! the "surround sound" on the G430 is just the external sound card, the "adapter to convert from 3.5 to USB" and some software tweaks so if you want a headset that can be used on PS3 buy the 430 but if is just for pc then you better buy this one.

context: Is this the ps vita or ps vita slim? Just making sure!:)

context: what is the storage in this unit and the internal memory
What is the difference between getting the Elsa and Anna characters separately versus getting the Frozen Toy Box Pack?  Sorry I am a bit confused.
response: The figurines are sold alone. The packs are sold with two characters and two power discs. The play sets are sold with two characters and their own "world" to play in.

context: Do you need the original Rise of Flight to play this Iron Cross edition, please?
response: You don't need the original Rise of Flight.  You can start off with the Iron Cross Edition.  The Iron Cross Edition is an upgrade with more skins and stuff's. You will not be disappointed.  Hope this helps.

context: I'm afraid that I won't like this game, does the gameplay suck?  I hear it's like one of those "click and move" Nancy Drew type things (no offense).
response: Right it is a move and click game which might not be for everyone. I enjoyed it and the game has a great story, which you are the creator of episode to episode.

context: if i buy fifa from usa would it work in uk ps4 console
response: I have purchased european games (Spain) of FIFA (Fifa 09 and Fifa 10) and they work fine in my ps3 here.  Not sure about the ps4, it seems it should, but I would probably send an email to EA.  Good luck!

context: can you hear game audio on this headset when not playing online?
response: It connects via Bluetooth so whatever you are doing on your console it receives the audio, both online and offline
